This module is focused on the development of a critical thinking rubric and providing suggestions for designing assessments for courses and programs. The text mentions the inclusion of assignments modified using the rubric and resources such as "Grading Students Work and Giving Students Feedback." The module also aims to engage teaching faculty in reflection on pedagogies and philosophies when moving curriculum to an online delivery mode, utilizing the Community of Inquiry model which includes social, teaching, and cognitive presences.

Additionally, there is a contact email provided for academic excellence at George Brown College: academicexcellence@georgebrown.ca.
